src:
Mensesneg: Jokowi Hargai Proses Hukum di MK, Perppu KPK Itu Urusan Lain
02 Nov 2019, 13:49 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Menteri Sekretaris Negara (Mensesneg) Pratikno menyebut Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menghargai proses uji materi UU KPK di Mahkamah Konstitusi (MK). Pratikno mengatakan Jokowi tidak ingin mencampuradukkan urusan uji materi dengan Peraturan Pemerintah Pengganti Undang-Undang (Perppu) KPK.
"Jadi kemarin Pak Presiden, kan kemarin saya ada di situ juga, kan maksud Pak Presiden itu intinya terkait dengan Perppu KPK itu adalah menghargai proses hukum yang berlangsung di MK," kata Pratikno di Lanud Halim Perdanakusuma, Jakarta, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
"Jadi isunya bukan tentang Perppu akan diterbitkan atau tidak, tapi beliau menghargai proses hukum yang sedang berlangsung di MK. Biarkan proses hukum itu berlangsung, berjalan. Nanti masalah Perppu KPK itu urusan lain," imbuhnya.
Pratikno menuturkan, Jokowi menunggu uji materi UU KPK selesai, baru kemudian memikirkan Perppu KPK. Dia kembali menegaskan Jokowi menghargai proses hukum yang berjalan di MK.
"Iya kira-kira begitu (menunggu uji materi). Tadi dipesankan oleh Pak Presiden, baca berita kok kesannya seperti itu, padahal sebetulnya yang ingin ditekankan oleh Presiden adalah menghargai proses yang hukum yang sedang berlangsung di MK," ucap Pratikno.
text:
Minister of State Secretariat: Jokowi Appreciates Legal Process in MK, Perppu KPK Is Another Business
02 Nov 2019, 13:49 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Minister of State Secretary (Menesneg) Pratikno said President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) appreciated the process of judicial review of the KPK Law in the Constitutional Court (MK). Pratikno said Jokowi did not want to confuse matters of material testing with Government Regulations in lieu of Law (Perppu) of the KPK.
"So yesterday the President, right yesterday I was there too, was the intention of the President essentially being related to the KPPU Perppu that was to respect the legal process that took place at the Constitutional Court," Pratikno said at Halim Perdanakusuma Air Base, Jakarta, Saturday (2/11 / 2019).
"So the issue is not about whether Perppu will be published or not, but he respects the ongoing legal process at the Constitutional Court. Let the legal process take place, proceed. Later the KPPU Perppu issue is another matter," he added.
Pratikno said, Jokowi was waiting for the judicial review of the KPK Law material, then only thinking about the KPPU Perppu. He reiterated Jokowi respects the legal process that runs in the Constitutional Court.
"Yes, I think so (waiting for the judicial review). It was ordered by the President, read the news, how does it feel like that, even though what the President wants to emphasize is respecting the legal process that is taking place in the Constitutional Court," Pratikno said.
